类的使用
org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal.BaseAction

  • 使用BaseAction的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions  
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal  
    org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch  

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions中BaseAction的使用

      org.openqa.selenium.interactions中BaseAction的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ButtonReleaseAction
      Releases the left mouse button
      class  ClickAction
      clicks an element.
      class  ClickAndHoldAction
      Presses the left mouse button without releasing it.
      class  ContextClickAction
      Context-clicks an element
      class  DoubleClickAction
      Double-clicks an element.
      class  KeyDownAction
      Emulates key press only, without the release.
      class  KeyUpAction
      Emulates key release only, without the press.
      class  MoveMouseAction
      Moves the mouse to an element.
      class  MoveToOffsetAction
      Move the mouse to a location within the element provided.
      class  SendKeysAction
      Sending a sequence of keys to an element.

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal中BaseAction的使用

      org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal中BaseAction的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DisplayAction
      This class represents an abstraction of devices that can execute an action within a display area.
      class  KeysRelatedAction
      Represents a general action related to keyboard input.
      class  MouseAction
      Base class for all mouse-related actions.
      class  SingleKeyAction
      Used both by KeyDownAction and KeyUpAction
      class  TouchAction
      Base class for all touch screen-related actions

    • org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch中BaseAction的使用

      org.openqa.selenium.interactions.touch中BaseAction的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DoubleTapAction
      Creates a double tap gesture on a touch screen.
      class  DownAction
      Creates a down gesture.
      class  FlickAction
      Creates a flick gesture.
      class  LongPressAction
      Creates a long press gesture.
      class  MoveAction
      Creates a move gesture.
      class  ScrollAction
      Creates a scroll gesture.
      class  SingleTapAction
      Creates a single tap gesture on a touch screen
      class  UpAction
      Creates an up gesture.
